sourcesContent: import { Flex, Text, Heading, Image, Box, List, ListItem, ListIcon, OrderedList, UnorderedList } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import { AiOutlineCheck } from 'react-icons/ai'; const Icon = 'data:image/png;base64,'; export default function About() { return ( Come in the Metaverse of Metamon Enter the amount of Metamon you would like to purchase. {' '} CONNECT The Numbers Mint Cost : 0.2 ETH + GAS Max Supply : 10,000 Presale Supply : 3050 {/* You can also use custom icons from react-icons */} Public Sale : 6900 Giveaway Supply : 50 (reserved for contest) Royalty Fees : 7.5% Token Type : ERC-721 File Hosting : IPFS ); }
